<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Proxy Settings of Prisma Cloud Compute</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/api/v31.02/settings/proxy"}></MethodEndpoint>



```
x-prisma-cloud-target-env: {"permission":"systemOperations","saas":true,"self-hosted":true}
x-public: true
```



Returns the proxy settings for Prisma Cloud Compute containers to access the Internet.

## cURL Request

Refer to the following example cURL request:

```bash
$ curl -k \
  -u <USER> \
  -H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
  -X GET \
  "https://<CONSOLE>/api/v<VERSION>/settings/proxy"
```


<div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

ProxySettings are the http proxy settings

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"ca"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Proxy's CA for Defender to trust. Required when using TLS intercept proxies.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"httpProxy"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"Proxy address.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"noProxy"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"List of addresses for which the proxy should not be used.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={true} className={"schemaItem"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"}><summary style={{}}><span className={"openapi-schema__container"}><strong className={"openapi-schema__property"}>password</strong><span className={"openapi-schema__name"}> object</span></span></summary><div style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><div style={{"marginTop":".5rem","marginBottom":".5rem"}}>

Secret Stores the plain and encrypted version of a value. The plain version is not stored in a database
